index.js

Generated by CoffeeScript 1.7.1

 
(function() {
  var colors, config, fileContentsCache, fs, getCodeview, isInBrowser, mapEvalOrigin, mapFrame, mapSourcePosition, path, prepareStackTrace, retrieveFile, retrieveSourceMap, sourceMapCache, sourcemap, sprintf, supportRelativeURL, uncaughtError;

  fs = require('fs');

  path = require('path');

  colors = require('colors');

  sourcemap = require('source-map');

  sprintf = require("sprintf-js").sprintf;

  config = module.exports.config = {
    stack: {
      view: true,
      modules: false,
      system: false
    },
    code: {
      view: true,
      before: 2,
      after: 2,
      modules: false
    },
    uncaught: {
      exit: true,
      timeout: 100,
      code: 2
    }
  };

  module.exports.install = function() {
    Error.prepareStackTrace = prepareStackTrace;
    return process.on('uncaughtException', uncaughtError);
  };

  uncaughtError = function(err) {
    module.exports.report(err);
    if (config.uncaught.exit) {
      return setTimeout(function() {
        console.error("Exiting after error logging timeout.");
        return process.exit(config.uncaught.code);
      }, config.uncaught.timeout);
    }
  };

  module.exports.report = function(err, level, codePart) {
    var entry, title, _i, _len, _ref, _results;
    if (err instanceof Error) {
      title = err.toString().bold[level != null ? 'magenta' : 'red'];
      if (level) {
        title = "Caused by " + title;
      }
      if (codePart) {
        title += " " + codePart;
      }
      console.error(title + err.stack.replace(/.*?\n/, '\n'));
      if (err.cause != null) {
        if (level == null) {
          level = 0;
        }
        if (typeof err.cause === 'object') {
          _ref = err.cause;
          _results = [];
          for (_i = 0, _len = _ref.length; _i < _len; _i++) {
            entry = _ref[_i];
            _results.push(module.exports.report(entry, level + 1, err.codePart != null));
          }
          return _results;
        } else {
          return module.exports.report(err.cause, level + 1, err.codePart != null);
        }
      }
    } else {
      return console.error(err.toString().red.bold);
    }
  };

  prepareStackTrace = function(err, stack) {
    if (!config.stack.view) {
      stack = stack.slice(0, 2);
    }
    return err.toString().bold.red + stack.map(function(frame) {
      var out;
      if (!(config.stack.modules || !~frame.getFileName().indexOf('/node_modules/'))) {
        return '';
      }
      if (!(config.stack.system || ~frame.getFileName().indexOf('/'))) {
        return '';
      }
      out = "\n  at " + frame;
      out += getCodeview(frame);
      if (frame = mapFrame(frame)) {
        out += "\n     " + frame;
        out += getCodeview(frame);
      }
      return out;
    }).join('');
  };

  getCodeview = function(frame) {
    var contents, i, line, lines, max, num, out, pos, _i, _j, _ref, _ref1;
    if (!config.code.view) {
      return '';
    }
    if (!(config.code.modules || !~frame.getFileName().indexOf('/node_modules/'))) {
      return '';
    }
    contents = retrieveFile(frame.getFileName());
    if (!contents) {
      return '';
    }
    lines = contents != null ? contents.split(/(?:\r\n|\r|\n)/) : void 0;
    out = '';
    max = lines.length.toString().length;
    num = frame.getLineNumber() - 1 - config.code.before;
    for (i = _i = 1, _ref = config.code.before; 1 <= _ref ? _i <= _ref : _i >= _ref; i = 1 <= _ref ? ++_i : --_i) {
      out += sprintf(("\n     %0" + max + "d: " + lines[num++]).grey, num);
    }
    line = sprintf("\n     %0" + max + "d: " + lines[num++], num);
    pos = frame.getColumnNumber() + max + 8;
    out += line.slice(0, pos - 1).yellow;
    out += line.slice(pos - 1, pos + 2).yellow.underline;
    out += line.slice(pos + 2).yellow;
    for (i = _j = 1, _ref1 = config.code.after; 1 <= _ref1 ? _j <= _ref1 : _j >= _ref1; i = 1 <= _ref1 ? ++_j : --_j) {
      out += sprintf(("\n     %" + max + "d: " + lines[num++]).grey, num);
    }
    return out;
  };

  mapFrame = function(frame) {
    var origin, position, source;
    source = frame.getFileName() || frame.getScriptNameOrSourceURL();
    if (source) {
      position = mapSourcePosition({
        source: source,
        line: frame.getLineNumber(),
        column: frame.getColumnNumber()
      });
      if (!position) {
        return null;
      }
      return {
        __proto__: frame,
        getFileName: function() {
          return position.source;
        },
        getLineNumber: function() {
          return position.line;
        },
        getColumnNumber: function() {
          return position.column;
        },
        getScriptNameOrSourceURL: function() {
          return position.source;
        }
      };
    }
    origin = frame.isEval() && frame.getEvalOrigin();
    if (origin) {
      origin = mapEvalOrigin(origin);
      return {
        __proto__: frame,
        getEvalOrigin: function() {
          return origin;
        }
      };
    }
    return null;
  };

  sourceMapCache = {};

  mapSourcePosition = function(position) {
    var mapPosition, sourceMap, urlAndMap;
    sourceMap = sourceMapCache[position.source];
    if (!sourceMap) {
      urlAndMap = retrieveSourceMap(position.source);
      if (urlAndMap) {
        sourceMap = sourceMapCache[position.source] = {
          url: urlAndMap.url,
          map: new sourcemap.SourceMapConsumer(urlAndMap.map)
        };
      }
    }
    if (sourceMap) {
      mapPosition = sourceMap.map.originalPositionFor(position);
      if (mapPosition.source) {
        mapPosition.source = supportRelativeURL(path.dirname(position.source), mapPosition.source);
        return mapPosition;
      }
    }
    return null;
  };

  retrieveSourceMap = function(source) {
    var dataUrlPrefix, dir, fileData, match, sourceMapData, sourceMappingURL;
    fileData = retrieveFile(source);
    match = /\/\/[#@]\s*sourceMappingURL=(.*)\s*$/m.exec(fileData);
    if (!match) {
      return null;
    }
    sourceMappingURL = match[1];
    sourceMapData = void 0;
    dataUrlPrefix = "data:application/json;base64,";
    if (sourceMappingURL.slice(0, dataUrlPrefix.length).toLowerCase() === dataUrlPrefix) {
      sourceMapData = new Buffer(sourceMappingURL.slice(dataUrlPrefix.length), "base64").toString();
    } else {
      dir = path.dirname(source);
      sourceMappingURL = supportRelativeURL(dir, sourceMappingURL);
      sourceMapData = retrieveFile(sourceMappingURL, "utf8");
    }
    if (!sourceMapData) {
      return null;
    }
    return {
      url: sourceMappingURL,
      map: sourceMapData
    };
  };

  isInBrowser = function() {
    return typeof window !== "undefined";
  };

  retrieveFile = function(path) {
    var contents, ex, xhr;
    if (path in fileContentsCache) {
      return fileContentsCache[path];
    }
    try {
      if (isInBrowser()) {
        xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
        xhr.open("GET", path, false);
        xhr.send(null);
        contents = (xhr.readyState === 4 ? xhr.responseText : null);
      } else {
        contents = fs.readFileSync(path, "utf8");
      }
    } catch (_error) {
      ex = _error;
      contents = null;
    }
    return fileContentsCache[path] = contents;
  };

  fileContentsCache = {};

  supportRelativeURL = function(dir, url) {
    var match, protocol;
    match = /^\w+:\/\/[^\/]*/.exec(dir);
    protocol = (match ? match[0] : "");
    return protocol + path.resolve(dir.slice(protocol.length), url);
  };

  mapEvalOrigin = function(origin) {
    var match, position;
    match = /^eval at ([^(]+) \((.+):(\d+):(\d+)\)$/.exec(origin);
    if (match) {
      position = mapSourcePosition({
        source: match[2],
        line: match[3],
        column: match[4]
      });
      return "eval at " + match[1] + " (" + position.source + ":" + position.line + ":" + position.column + ")";
    }
    match = /^eval at ([^(]+) \((.+)\)$/.exec(origin);
    if (match) {
      return "eval at " + match[1] + " (" + mapEvalOrigin(match[2]) + ")";
    }
    return origin;
  };

}).call(this);
